Relatore in occasione della 38ma Conferenza Mondiale SSHA con un paper sul tema: “On the Altar of Opposition: Italian Emigrant Clergy and the Catholic Side of Antifascism in Detroit”, Panel: “Migration, the State, and Catholic Social and Political Criticism” - Migration/Immigration Network (Chair: Prof. James R. Relatore in occasione del 23rd World Congress IPSA in qualità di Author, nell’ambito del Panel su “Religious Criticism and Protest: Two Driving Forces for Socio-Political Change?”, con un Paper dal titolo “Within the Spiritual-Industrial Complex”: The Commonweal’s Realist Critique of U.S. Foreign Policy during the 1950s.

Relatore in occasione del XXVIII Convegno Annuale della Società Italiana di Scienza Politica, all’interno del Panel “Religion and Political Parties”, con un intervento dal titolo: “Getting the Hall to change the Country:” American Catholicism and the US Democratic Party during the New Deal Era”
